entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 5:36 PM CST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 5:36 PM CST Saturday 07 January 2023
